tweet:
43 years today since I first entered South Block.
Time flies, world changes, bonds are stronger. Journey continues.

I hail from the South. 

I am an MP from a Western state. 

I was born, educated and worked in the North.

I represented all of India before the World. 

India is one. 
Never run down a region; never divide us.

Yes, the Indian Foreign Service has changed.

Yes, they follow the orders of the Government. 

Yes, they counter the arguments of others. 

No, its not called Arrogance. 

It is called Confidence.

And it is called defending National Interest.

Motivated campaigns targeting India will never succeed. We have the self confidence today to hold our own. This India will push back. 

#IndiaTogether 
#IndiaAgainstPropaganda

Fondly remember Sushma Swaraj ji on the anniversary of her passing away. 
In our thoughts, so many times in so many ways.
Seeking the blessing of Maa Amba ji at the Navratri celebrations in Vadodara.

My first tweet.

Thank you all for the best wishes!
Honoured to be given this responsibility. 
Proud to follow on the footsteps of 
@SushmaSwaraj
 ji
Never forget.

Deeply grieved to inform of the passing away today of my mother Sulochana Subrahmanyam. We ask her friends and well-wishers to keep her in their thoughts. Our family is especially grateful to all those who supported her during her illness.
On Ganesh Chaturthi: sharing a BBC clip on celebrations in Ghana.

Arrived in Moscow. 

Look forward to my engagements.

Honoured to call on President Vladimir Putin this evening. Conveyed the warm greetings of PM 
@narendramodi
 and handed over a personal message. 

Apprised President Putin of my discussions with Ministers Manturov and Lavrov. Appreciated his guidance on the further developments of…

Reaffirming a civilisational connect.

Monolithic sandstone Shiv Linga of 9th c CE is latest find in ongoing conservation project. Applaud 
@ASIGoI
 team for their work at Cham Temple Complex, My Son, #Vietnam. Warmly recall my visit there in 2011.

Made in India vaccines reach Afghanistan. Stand with our friends, always. 

#VaccineMaitri
Received a call from ROK FM Chung Eui-yong today. Discussed bilateral and multilateral issues as also the Hyundai matter.

In Lok Sabha, 
@RahulGandhi
 said we could not get a foreign guest for Republic Day. Those who live in India know we were in the midst of a corona wave. 

The 5 Central Asian Presidents, who were to come, did hold a virtual summit on Jan 27. Did Rahul Gandhi miss that as well?

Two diyas - one for me and the other for my 88 year old mother who could not be at the door.

Joining an expression of mass solidarity. India stands united as never before. 
Jai Hind

#9pm9minute

Let us get the facts straight. 

All troops on border duty always carry arms, especially when leaving post. Those at Galwan on 15 June did so. Long-standing practice (as per 1996 & 2005 agreements) not to use firearms during faceoffs.

The G20 Summit and its bilateral meetings concluded today in New Delhi. 

The New Delhi Declaration shows that our Presidency was able to table ideas, shape global issues, bridge divides and forge consensus. We kept the focus on Global South. 

We showcased our civilizational…

Thank you Pradhan Mantri 
@narendramodi
 for your kind birthday wishes. 

Your vision is a constant inspiration as we work towards our nation’s growth and development.
Chandrayaan-3 is today embarking on a journey that carries the hopes of 1.4 billion Indians. The whole nation prays for its success.

Arrived in Canberra to a Tiranga welcome. 

So happy to see the old Parliament house of Australia in our national colors.
This morning at the BRICS Summit.

Congratulate Team 
@isro
 on the flawless #Chandrayaan3 mission. The entire nation is proud of you.

This achievement resonates around the world.

Remembering Sushma Swaraj ji on the anniversary of her passing away. 
So many conversations,  so many memories.

Pay my respects to India’s second Prime Minister, Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri ji on his Jayanti.

An epitome of strength and simplicity, his leadership and courage will always remain an inspiration.

A sad day for Japan, for India,the world and for me personally. 

A quarter century of memories of Shinzo Abe. No words to express them.

Tributes to Veer Savarkar on his Jayanti. 

His patriotism, courage and commitment motivate us in the building of a New India. 

His many  contributions to the nation will continue to inspire generations.

.
@RahulGandhi
 hs questions on Foreign Policy. Here are some answers:

•Our major partn’ships are strongr & internat’l standng higher.Witness regular summits&informal meetngs wth #US #Russia #Europe & #Japan.India engages #China on more equal terms politically.

Ask the analysts. https://twitter.com/RahulGandhi/status/1284002386806095872…

Join the nation in felicitating Prime Minister 
@narendramodi
 ji on his 73rd birthday. 

His vision and inspirational leadership is transforming the country and has enhanced our standing on the world stage. 

Pray for his good health and many more years in service of the nation.…
How it started                         How it’s going
Some Foreign Ministers do read books. May be a good habit for some Professors too. In that case, strongly recommend the one I released yesterday.

Had the blessings of Shri Padmanabha Swami at Thiruvananthapuram today.

Every devotee knows how much it means.

आप सभी को महाशिवरात्रि के पावन पर्व की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। भोलेनाथ सब के जीवन में सुख, समृद्धि और शांति प्रदान करें। 

जय भोलेनाथ!

देश का भरोसा, मोदी की गारंटी।

#ModiKiGuarantee

However, irresponsible comments from those who should know better can damage long-standing partnerships. 

So, let me clarify- Delhi CM does not speak for India.

Regarding evacuation of Indian nationals from Ukraine, we are making progress.

Our teams are working on the ground round the clock. I am personally monitoring. 

The first flight to Mumbai with 219 Indian nationals has taken off from Romania.

Trust the Pharmacy of the World. Made in India vaccines arrive in Brazil. 

#VaccineMaitri

Consolidating our Caribbean connect. Barbados receives Made in India vaccines. 

#VaccineMaitri
Ekta

Blessed to visit Shri Makakaleshwar Temple in Ujjain today. 

The Shri Mahakal Lok Corridor is truly a remarkable achievement that will be appreciated by all devotees.

Shades of the Emergency! 
The arrest of Arnab Goswami is an attack on the freedom of press. Those who really believe in this freedom must speak up!

Made in India vaccines reach Dubai. A special friend, a special relationship.

#VaccineMaitri

Launching #OperationAjay to facilitate the return from Israel of our citizens who wish to return. 

Special charter flights and other arrangements being put in place.

Fully committed to the safety and well-being of our nationals abroad.

A momentous day for the nation. 
A pledge redeemed. 
A heritage reaffirmed. 

#JaiShriRam
Deeply shocked to learn of the passing away of Smt Sushma Swaraj. Difficult to accept this news. The whole nation grieves, the Foreign Ministry even more so.
Fondly remember Sushma Swaraj ji on her birthday. Deeply missed, always.

Daughters - a special joy, a unique bond. Their accomplishments always make us proud. 

#NationalGirlChildDay 
#DeshkiBeti

By visiting Lakshadweep, PM 
@narendramodi
 has focused attention on its immense potential for tourism. This is a great inspiration for all of us. 

More visitors will contribute to Lakshadweep’s prosperity. They will also experience its unique culture and traditions. 

As India…

•And #Pakistan (that you skipped) surely notes the difference between Balakot & Uri on the one hand, and Sharm-el-Sheikh, Havana & 26/11 on the other. 

Ask yourself.
Fondly remembering Sushma Swaraj ji on her birthday. So many situations bring back so many memories.

Terrorism threatens humanity.

Today, on 26/11, the world joins India in remembering its victims. Those who planned and oversaw this attack must be brought to justice. 

We owe this to every victim of terrorism around the world.

Made in India vaccines now reach Kuwait. Valuing our close friendship and strong ties. 

#VaccineMaitri

Congratulate #TeamIndia for their historic win in men's Badminton in the Thomas Cup.

A real inspiration for so many young Indians.

Rahul Gandhi alleged in Lok Sabha that it is this Government which brought Pakistan and China together.Perhaps, some history lessons are in order:

-In 1963,Pakistan illegally handed over the  Shaksgam valley to China.

-China built the Karakoram highway through PoK in the 1970s.
Remembering Sushma Swaraj ji today. Her warm and inspiring presence missed so much.
Movement of the Indian Ambassador and the Embassy staff from Kabul to India was a difficult and complicated exercise. Thank all those whose cooperation and facilitation made it possible.

A busy but satisfying week at the #UNGA: 

• Heard a great speech on New India from PM 
@narendramodi
, as did the world
• Met 42 Foreign Ministers in all
• 36 bilateral meetings
• 8 pull asides
• 7 multilateral/plurilaterals
• 3 speaking engagements

Deeply shocked at tragic demise of CDS General Bipin Rawat and his wife.

We worked closely together in the last few years. It is a huge loss to the nation.

Towards a fitter, healthier, happier India. 

Keep running. Keep growing. 

#FitIndiaFreedomRun 
#Run4India
 #FitIndiaMovement 
@KirenRijiju

Made in India vaccines arrive in Muscat. Reflects a deep friendship, spanning millenia. 

#VaccineMaitri

#OperationGanga continues. 

The second flight from Bucharest has taken off for Delhi with 250 Indian nationals.

A powerful and impactful address by PM 
@narendramodi
 to the UN General Assembly today. 12 big policy takeaways: 

1. Representing the Mother of Democracy and based on his own experiences, PM affirms that democracy can deliver, democracy has delivered.

Prime Minister 
@narendramodi
’s decision of naming 21 islands in Andaman and Nicobar after our heroes was a much needed initiative. 

It honours those who made sacrifices to protect the motherland.

A busy week for Indian diplomacy.

Italy State visit

G20 Foreign Ministers’ Meeting

Quad FMM

IBSA Handover

India-Europe Conclave

Met this morning with the families of the 8 Indians detained in Qatar.

Stressed that Government attaches the highest importance to the case. Fully share the concerns and pain of the families.

Underlined that Government will continue to make all efforts to secure their release.…
नवरात्रि के शुभ अवसर पर सभी देशवासियों को हार्दिक शुभकामनाएँ। आशा करता हूँ कि माँ शक्ति की कृपा सभी पर बनी रहे और यह त्यौहार उल्लास एवं सुख से पूर्ण रहे।

Remembering Sushma Swaraj ji on her birth anniversary today. 

Always in our thoughts, her warmth, dedication and inspiring presence are deeply missed.

Irony that those who seek intervention from abroad now believe that I.N.D.I.A can serve as a cover. 

Not to worry; the people will see through it.

India demonstrates solidarity with the people of Lebanon in the aftermath of the tragic explosions in Beirut. 58 MT of emergency humanitarian aid, including crucial medical and food supplies, is on its way to Beirut in IAF C17 aircraft.

समस्त देशवासियों को श्री गणेश चतुर्थी के पावन पर्व की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। भगवान श्री गणेश सभी को सुख, समृद्धि और अच्छे स्वास्थ्य का आशीर्वाद दें।

गणपति बप्पा मोरया।
A productive three day visit to Singapore. Pleasant memories, exciting possibilities.

Delighted to call on Prime Minister 
@RishiSunak
 on #Diwali Day. Conveyed the best wishes of PM 
@narendramodi
. 

India and UK are actively engaged in reframing the relationship for contemporary times. 

Thank Mr. and Mrs. Sunak for their warm reception and gracious hospitality.

#OperationGanga update 

9 flights taken off today from Hungary, Romania, Slovakia and Poland. Includes IAF aircrafts. 

6 flights more expected to depart shortly. 

Altogether, will bring back more than 3000 Indian nationals.

Good news keeps coming in 

A deserving recognition for our traditional art and architecture.

The sixth #OperationDost flight reaches Türkiye. 

More search and rescue teams, dog squads, essential search & access equipment, medicines and medical equipment ready for deployment in the relief efforts.
Have seen pictures of what is happening in #JNU. Condemn the violence unequivocally. This is completely against the tradition and culture of the university.

A two-year project finally concluded. Thank all those who made it possible. 

Should hit the bookstands in early September.
Delivered to Dominican Republic. #VaccineMaitri reaches our Caribbean friends.

A cleaner workplace is a better workspace. 

Weekend being used to good effect.
Departing Glasgow. My takeaway picture....

Simply appalled at your tweet! There are lives at stake; don’t do politics. 

Since the fighting started on April 14th, the Embassy of India in Khartoum has been continuously in touch with most Indian Nationals and PIOs in Sudan.

Beyond the neighbourhood, now to the Nile. Egypt receives Made in India vaccines. 

#VaccineMaitri

Heartiest congratulations to the Government and people of Switzerland on their National Day. 

Will continue our efforts for advancing our long standing Dynamic Partnership.

The Global South speaks on India. 

Listen to them

Thank you for your kind greetings and good wishes Prime Minister 
@narendramodi
. 

Your leadership and guidance is a constant motivation to work for the nation.
Waiting at the Major Dhyanchand National Stadium for the Run for Unity 2022.
For those who love Old Cricket and New India. Perhaps even for those who understand neither cricket nor India.
